items.title: Health Care Providers Are Dropping a Common Anesthesia Drug That’s Also a Climate Super Pollutant
items.description: Desflurane is a common anesthetic used in hospital operating rooms worldwide. It’s also a climate super pollutant. Now, several decades after the drug was first introduced, a growing number of U.S. hospitals have stopped using the anesthetic because of its outsized environmental impact. On January 1, the European Union went a step further, prohibiting its […]

items.title: Ten Million Corals Are in the Path of a Federal Dredging Project in Florida
